{"id":968101857,"question_id":2824,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1686408387,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/968101857/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Check if The Number is Fascinating","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    \n     boolean[] arr;\n    public boolean isFascinating(int n) {\n        \n        arr =new boolean[10];\n        \n        \n        return arr[0]==false && helper(n) && helper(2*n) && helper(3*n);\n        \n        \n    }\n    \n    private boolean helper(int n){\n        String s = String.valueOf(n);\n        for(int i=0; i<s.length(); i++){\n            \n            int k = s.charAt(i)-'0';\n            \n            if(arr[k]==true)\n                return false;\n            \n            arr[k]=true;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"check-if-the-number-is-fascinating","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
